title: Violet Victoria & Fan Star UCF Knights Pendant Necklace and Earring Set * CAN Also BE Used AS A Bracelet Charm
features: This amazing set is perfect for showing off your school spirit! The pendant can either be used as a necklace as shown, or you can put it onto your charm bracelet (see picture for side view).
The pendant comes with an 18" rhodium plated chain. The earrings are hook style and also rhodium plated.
The logo on the earrings is the SAME SIZE as the logo on the pendant. Most logos measure 3/8" - 1/2" tall alone and 1" - 1-1/2" tall with the pendant and earring hooks.
These items are very lightweight and easy to wear.
This item was designed and manufactured by Violet Victoria.
